response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $10,800. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with an unparalleled value, ensuring that you receive the best possible experience with our product. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10800}
